"I... lost?<br>For this reality to come:
"This is wonderful!
Here, I've always thought I'm
at the peak of perfection.
It seems like I'm only halfway through!"

"Some arrogance I have! How immature of me!
This, is why life's interesting!"

"<%me>.
Thank you very much.
I've learned of my immaturity."

"I'm also happy at the same time.
I'll become much stronger.
That's because I know that people
are still far away from the
heights of their limits."

"Today's fight.
It's something that I won't forget
in my long life-time."

"The frustration of losing in a fight
is also part of being a human.
Next time... I won't lose."
